title: Stargate Upgrade- Second time is a charm!
description:
Proposal to complete the Stargate upgrade, halt `cosmoshub-3` at 06:00 UTC on Feb 18th, export the state and start `cosmoshub-4` based on gaia 4.0.

 Gaia Commit hash: 
 2bb04266266586468271c4ab322367acbf41188f  Proposal details can be found on 
 github: https://github.com/cosmos/governance/pull/13 
 ipfs: https://cloudflare-ipfs.com/ipfs/XX 
 sia: https://siasky.net/XX
